thread.title: Coach Steve Giacolone becomes 300-game winner in each of two sports
thread.title_full: Coach Steve Giacolone becomes 300-game winner in each of two sports | Newsday

author: Kenny DeJohn
title: Coach Steve Giacolone becomes 300-game winner in each of two sports
text:
advertisement | advertise on newsday
Coaching from the sidelines, Eastport-South Manor girls varsity head coach Steve Giacolone gets his 300th career win in a home game against East Islip on Thursday, Feb. 2, 2017. (Credit: Joseph D. Sullivan)
When Steve Giacolone reminisces about his past 30 years coaching high school sports, he can regale you with stories of specific players, teams and moments.
He appreciates the value of the high points and the low points, and he remembers what he learned from the minutiae of each situation. Perhaps thatâ€™s a reason why he now stands alone in the Long Island coaching record books.
